outputVariables.name: BuildTools.EnvironmentUrl
outputVariables.description: Output variable of newly copied environment; will by default be consumed by following tasks

inputs.name: authenticationType
inputs.label: Authentication type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authentication via username/password is simpler to set up but won't work if your AAD tenant requires MFA; use Service Principal Name (SPN) if MFA is required.

inputs.name: PowerPlatformEnvironment
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authenticate with your Power Platform environment with username/password. Does not support MFA.

inputs.name: PowerPlatformSPN
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authenticate with your Power Platform environment with an Azure AppID, tenantID and client secret.

inputs.name: Environment
inputs.label: Source Environment Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment url this task targets; default is the pipeline variable that e.g. the CreateEnvironment task has set before.

inputs.name: TargetEnvironmentUrl
inputs.label: Target environment url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the target environment url to copy to.

inputs.name: OverrideFriendlyName
inputs.label: Override Friendly Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check to override the friendly name of the target environment.

inputs.name: FriendlyName
inputs.label: Friendly Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the friendly name of the target environment.

inputs.name: DisableAdminMode
inputs.label: Disable Admin Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify whether to Disable the administration mode.
